name: OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. William J. PERRONE, Respondent
name_abbreviation: Office of Disciplinary Counsel v. Perrone
docket_number: No. 959, Disciplinary Docket No. 2—Supreme Court. No. 74 DB 93 Disciplinary Board

judges: MONTEMURO, J., participates by designation as a senior judge as provided by Pa.R.J.A. No. 701(f).
parties: OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. William J. PERRONE, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 30th day of November, 1995, upon consideration of the Report and Recommendations of the Disciplinary Board dated October 18,1995, it is hereby
ORDERED that WILLIAM J. PERRONE be and he is DISBARRED, retroactive to September 1,1993, from thé Bar of this Commonwealth and he shall comply with all the provisions of Rule 217, Pa.R.D.E.
It is further ORDERED that respondent shall pay costs to the Disciplinary Board pursuant to Rule 208(g), Pa.R.D.E.
MONTEMURO, J., participates by designation as a senior judge as provided by Pa.R.J.A. No. 701(f).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

casebody.head_matter:
669 A.2d 880
OFFICE OF DISCIPLINARY COUNSEL, Petitioner, v. William J. PERRONE, Respondent.

Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Nov. 30, 1995.
